# ZERO TOLERANCE RULES
You may be banned for any of the below rules with no previous warning.
- Players must be at least 17 years of age to play New Frontier. Players must be and act at least 17 years old or they will be banned until they are of age.
- End of round grief (EORG) is not permitted and results in an instant 3 hour ban.
- Absolutely no sexual content or Erotic Roleplay (ERP), including direct or indirect mentions of sexual behavior, actions or jokes. The server age minimum is 17, minors may be present.
- Absolutely no hate speech, slurs, bigotry, racism, specism (demeaning other characters in-game due to their in-game race), sexism, disability-related or anything even remotely similar.
- Don't communicate in-game/in-character information through methods outside of the game. This is referred to as "Metacommunication". Admins will not moderate metacommunication, and will assume it is being abused. (All involved will be actioned on.)
- Don't use exploits or external programs to play, gain an advantage, or disrupt the server in any way or form.
- Attempting to evade game bans will result in an appeal-only ban.
- Attempting to evade job bans will result in an appeal-only ban.
